channel.title: Xbox 360 song
channel.description:
Goodbye Mr Gates written by me( to be sung to the tune of Goodbye Mr.A) [u]Goodbye Mr Gates- Sanga282(ancient)[/u] There's a hole in your console You had none of the answers And A great big RROD And expect me to buy it
And Goodbye Mr Gates You promised you would love us But you consol sucked Goodbye Mr Gates You had all the games But no disk drive space If it's got no action Its a 360 Our Hate is a fraction Of what we feel for you
Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh (Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh) (Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh) (Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh)
So busy showing me us Xbox live You forgot to fix your errors Oh-Oh-Oh So so superior, your not You're cool a little bit but you suck alot
Goodby Mr Gates You promised you would love us But Xbox Live sucked Goodbye Mr Gates You none of the answers And no disk drive space If it's got no action Its a 360 Our Hate is a fraction Of what we feel for you
Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh (Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh) (Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh) (Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh-Oh)
(Goodbye Mr Gates) (Goodbye Mr Gates)
Goodbye Mr Gates The console was full of bugs till Sony opened my eyes Goodbye Mr Gates (Goodbye Mr Gates) Wish you hadn't blown my disk drive and killed my wife Goodbye Mr Gates You promised you would love us but Sony did better Goodbye Mr Gates You had none of the answers To your RROD If it's got no action Its a 360 Our Hate is a fraction Of what we feel for you

item.title: Xbox 360 song
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:2, topic:164496”]“You promised you would love us but Sony did better”

Sony is gay.
Making PS2 again.
Faggots.[/quote]

PS3 pwns the shit outta xbox360. xbox360 has halo that is all… without halo xbox360 probably wouldnt be out yet.

item.title: Xbox 360 song

item.description:
@tL wrote:

A dual layer blueray disc can hold upto 50gb, a dual layer dvd can only hold upto 8.7gb.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 song
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

they could make a a fairly huge game for ps3 where you install the first disk and the second has some more data and the start files for the game then you could have twice as much in the game. With external hardrives that wouldn’t be a problem because you would have tonnes of space. they might be bringing wow to the PS3

item.title: Xbox 360 song
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

Wii anybody?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2007, 02:27:25 PM[/size][hr][quote=“ThugLife, post:9, topic:164496”]There are rumors going around that because the new GTA thats coming out is so big that they will need 2 - 3 disks for the xbox version, but only one for the ps3 since blueray can hold more data.[/quote]

That is, unheard of, how is that going to work?

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

As do I, as do I. Most of my friends who argue that the 360 is better, used to say “Yeah well PS3 doesn’t have great games… Like… Halo”… Halo’s a failure in my eyes.

item.title: Xbox 360 song
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

PS3 is always going to be better than the Xbox. Ofcourse, the Live system isn’t as good, but it’s good all the same. And like Thug says, soon, the PS3 will have everything the 360 has and more.

I myself have a 360, but I wish I had bought a PS3 instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 song

item.description:
@tL wrote:

Greeny:

Xbox > Wii > PS3

Mr.Chris:

i lol’d, irl.

Anyway, this is not yours - i have seen this around for ages - youtube.
Xbox live at the moment is better than Playstation network, but once Playstation home comes out, it will have everything xbox live has got but for free :).
